entry.title: Saturday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
